name: Agent-MCP (rinadelph)
description: [项目级] Agent-MCP is a framework for creating multi-agent systems that enables coordinated, efficient AI collaboration through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). The system is designed for developers building AI applications that benefit from multiple specialized agents working in parallel on different aspects of a project.。来源: https://github.com/rinadelph/Agent-MCP

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Agent-MCP is a framework for creating multi-agent systems that enables coordinated, efficient AI collaboration through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). The system is designed for developers building AI applications that benefit from multiple specialized agents working in parallel on different aspects of a project.

来源: https://github.com/rinadelph/Agent-MCP
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 1164
